content.text: 1 (9 inch) deep dish frozen pie crust
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (9 inch) deep dish frozen pie crust" )

content.text: 3 dashes hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco), or to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "3 dashes hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco), or to taste" )
( ing-6 "1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese" )
( ing-8 "1 (8 ounce) package imitation crabmeat, flaked" )

content.text: 0) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "the oven"@11:19 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@38:51 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Bake the pie crust for about 10 minutes, until just starting to brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the pie crust"@8:21 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "about 10 minutes"@26:42 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until just starting to brown"@44:72 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Remove from the oven, and allow to cool.
3) In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, cream, salt, pepper, and hot sauce.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "whisk"@20:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the eggs"@35:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cream"@45:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@52:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "pepper"@58:64 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "hot sauce"@70:79 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Stir in shredded cheese, onion and imitation crab.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "shredded cheese"@11:26 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-6 )
			:ref ( ing-7 )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-9 "onion"@28:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "imitation crab"@38:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, then turn off the oven, but leave the door closed.
7) Leave quiche in the oven for an additional 20 to 30 minutes until firm.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Leave"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "quiche"@9:15 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "the oven"@19:27 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "an additional 20 to 30 minutes"@32:62 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until firm"@63:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
